user.description: Step 1 of 3 — Link your ESPHome climate entity and configure basic settings.

data.name: Friendly name
data.on_hvac_mode: HVAC mode used when turning on

data_description.climate_entity: The climate entity created by your ESPHome midea_dehum (or similar) component.
data_description.on_hvac_mode: The HVAC mode that will be activated on the climate entity when you turn the dehumidifier on. For midea_dehum this is usually 'dry'.
data_description.min_humidity: Lowest humidity setpoint the slider will allow.
data_description.max_humidity: Highest humidity setpoint the slider will allow.

modes.title: Operating Modes
modes.description: Step 2 of 3 — Select which preset modes to expose. These are read from the climate entity '{climate_entity}'. Deselect any modes your device does not support.

data_description.modes: Only modes selected here will appear in the humidifier mode picker. Leave all deselected to disable mode support entirely.

extras.title: Optional Companion Entities
extras.description: Step 3 of 3 — Link the additional entities created by ESPHome for this device. All fields are optional — only fill in the ones that exist for your device.

data_description.current_humidity_entity: When set, this sensor is used for current humidity instead of the climate entity's current_temperature attribute.
data_description.tank_level_entity: Reports the current tank water level (if your device supports it).
data_description.pm25_entity: PM2.5 air quality sensor (if your device supports it).
data_description.bucket_full_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when the water tank is full.
data_description.clean_filter_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when filter cleaning is required.
data_description.defrost_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when the defrost cycle is running.
data_description.ionizer_entity: Switch to control the ionizer (if your device has one).
data_description.pump_entity: Switch to control the pump (if your device supports it).
data_description.sleep_entity: Switch to enable/disable sleep mode (if your device supports it).
data_description.beep_entity: Switch to control whether the device beeps on command.
